item.title: å®ä¹ æ€»ç»“
item.description: Deepflow environment é…ç½® Server 1.Install Golang 1.1 wget https://golang.google.cn/dl/go1.19.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz 1.2 sudo tar -C /usr/local/ -xzf go1.19.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz 1.3 cd /usr/local/ 1.4 echo $PATH 1.5 sudo nano $HOME/.profile 1.6 source .profile 2.Install Protobuf-compiler dnf install -y protobuf-compiler 3.Set Proxy go env -w GO111MODULE=on go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn,direct 4.Make Begin->cd /server make 4.1 ç¼ºprotoc-gen-gofast è§£
